name: Carpool (Proof of Concept)
description:
Explore a week in the lives of 5 commuters who ride together to downtown Denver.

You will watch them as if through a pane of glass. Tou may change their lives, or you may not. 

And remember: not making a choice is a choice itself.

Thanks to Allison Still for playtesting and proofreading.

This is proof-of-concept for a visual novel, so please leave me any feedback or ideas!
